mapper.select: select * from t_user where username=#{username} and userpwd=#{userpwd}

SELECT count(*) FROM t_houseinfo a LEFT JOIN t_house_leasetype b ON a.leasetype = b.typeid LEFT JOIN t_house_price c on a.hoseid = c.houseid LEFT JOIN t_user d ON a.userid = d.userid LEFT JOIN t_user_info e ON d.userid = e.userid

SELECT a.hoseid,a.houseadderss,a.roomnum,a.hallnum,a.bednum,b.leasetype as leasetypes,c.dayprice,d.username,e.email as emaila,a.`status` FROM t_houseinfo a LEFT JOIN t_house_leasetype b ON a.leasetype = b.typeid LEFT JOIN t_house_price c on a.hoseid = c.houseid LEFT JOIN t_user d ON a.userid = d.userid LEFT JOIN t_user_info e ON d.userid = e.userid order by a.createdate limit #{start},#{rows}
mapper.update: update t_houseinfo set status = #{num} where hoseid = #{houseid}
